campaigns.title: Helping Shriners of the Upstate with making the life of another child better
campaigns.story:
About Me:
My daughter was diagnosed with Miserable Malalignment Syndrome that affects her legs and knee joints. Her condition got worse over time and she dealt with a lot of pain with just normal walking. We were able to get in contact with Shriners and they went step by step with my daughter to help explain her condition and what they will be doing to correct her condition. They have been excellent with her operation and care. Providing a healthy and positive experience for my daughter as well as myself and wife. They provided top notch care while my daughter was at there facility and I recommended their services to anyone. Shriners is a donation driven service that needs all the help it can get from the community. It has been a God send for my daughter and I hope you can help them be one for another family in need.

What I Need:
Donation to Shriners of the upstate

How Funds Will Be Used:
Provide care and needs of children in need of their services

campaigns.title: Reid & Gravy's Epic American Road Trip Adventure
campaigns.story:
About Me:
Reid is the kind of guy who lives and breathes the American spirit ‚Äì the relentless drive to build something meaningful, to fight for what's right, and to never back down from a challenge. For months now, he's poured his heart and soul into Patriot Pledge NFTs, a groundbreaking fundraising platform designed to empower causes that uphold freedom, community, and the values that make this country great. Late nights coding, testing in beta, connecting with supporters ‚Äì Reid's been on a mission to make blockchain work for real patriots, turning digital collectibles into real-world impact.

But even the strongest patriots need to recharge. Enter Gravy, Reid's faithful standard poodle sidekick ‚Äì that big, curly-coated bundle of energy with the soulful eyes and the orange collar that screams "ready for anything." Gravy's been right there through it all: curled up at Reid's feet during marathon dev sessions, offering wet-nosed nudges when the bugs got frustrating, and providing those unconditional tail-wags that remind us why we fight for a better tomorrow.

What I Need:
Lately, life's felt a little too serious. Between the endless grind of building the platform and staying true to those core principles of liberty and hard work, Reid and Gravy have been craving some pure, unfiltered fun. You know ‚Äì windows down, sunroof open, wind whipping through Gravy's fluffy fur, exploring the open roads of this beautiful land we call home. A real vacation: hiking national parks under wide-open skies, chasing waves at the beach, grilling burgers at a roadside campsite, and just soaking in the freedom that so many have sacrificed to protect.

How Funds Will Be Used:
By pledging to this campaign through Patriot Pledge NFTs, you're not just supporting a break for a hardworking builder and his best friend ‚Äì you're celebrating the American dream in action: work hard, stay loyal, and remember to live freely. Funds raised will go straight toward an epic road trip adventure for Reid & Gravy ‚Äì gas, treats, park passes, and all the memories that remind us why we love this country. Pledge today, grab your exclusive "Reid & Gravy Adventure" NFT, and join us on the journey!

campaigns.title: Larry Odom II: A Beacon of Resilience in the Fight Against CRPS
campaigns.story:
In the heart of McAlester, Oklahoma, Larry Odom II embodies the unyielding spirit of perseverance, turning personal adversity into a powerful force for good. As a dedicated collaborator in the innovative BlockDAG network project, Larry brings his sharp insights and collaborative energy to our team's mission of building decentralized solutions for a brighter future. But beyond the digital frontiers, Larry's story is one of extraordinary courage‚Äîa handicapped warrior battling Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS) and other health challenges that test the limits of human endurance every day.
Living with CRPS means navigating a world of unrelenting pain, where even the simplest joys can become Herculean feats. Yet Larry refuses to be defined by his struggles. From his home in McAlester, he inspires those around him with his quiet determination, his passion for community, and his unwavering commitment to making a difference. Whether it's sharing laughs with friends, exploring new ideas in blockchain technology, or simply rising each morning to face the day, Larry's life is a testament to the power of the human will.
This exclusive NFT isn't just a digital collectible‚Äîit's a piece of Larry's journey, minted as a symbol of hope and solidarity. Crafted in collaboration with our nonprofit fundraising app, proceeds from this NFT will directly support CRPS research, adaptive technology for the disabled community, and local initiatives in Oklahoma to provide relief and resources for those living with chronic pain. By acquiring this one-of-a-kind token, you're not only investing in Larry's vision for a connected world through BlockDAG but also fueling real change for countless others facing invisible battles.
Why This NFT?

Unique Artwork: A custom digital portrait capturing Larry's resilient essence, blended with BlockDAG-inspired motifs symbolizing unbreakable chains and emerging light.
Impact Stats: 100% of net proceeds go to CRPS awareness and support programs via Vets Helping Vets Life.
Edition: Limited to 100 pieces‚Äîearly supporters get bonus access to our upcoming BlockDAG testnet events.
Story Integration: Embedded metadata includes Larry's personal mantra: "Pain may bend me, but it will never break the network we build together."

Join Larry in this fusion of technology and tenacity. Mint your NFT today and be part of a story that proves: even in the darkest nodes, connection creates light. #CRPSWarrior #BlockDAG #NFTforGood

Now it‚Äôs time to stop defending and start building.
This fundraiser is about giving one veteran the war chest he needs to travel, speak, create content, host events, and shout from every rooftop that BlockDAG is back ‚Äî cleaner, stronger, and truly ours.

Every dollar goes straight into megaphones, plane tickets, and microphones ‚Äî nothing else.

How Funds Will Be Used:

campaigns.title: Go BeerMe
campaigns.story:
About Me:
üç∫ 

Josh has a dream.
Not a noble dream‚Ä¶ not a world-saving dream‚Ä¶ but a cold, frothy, beautifully unnecessary dream.

Every weekend, inspired by none other than Stone Cold Steve Austin himself, Josh attempts the legendary double-can beer smash. He raises those cans. He cracks them. He roars like a bargain-bin wrestler. And then‚Äîas destiny demands‚Äîhe dumps the beer straight into his mouth with the aggressive enthusiasm of a man who believes gravity is optional.

Unfortunately‚Ä¶ gravity is not optional.

Half the beer ends up on Josh.
A quarter ends up on the floor.
And whatever survives the splash zone ends up in his beard.

This heroic waste has consequences: Josh is burning through beer faster than a backstage WWE cooler.

So we come to you, kind reader, with a simple plea:

What I Need:
Support Josh‚Äôs Beer Recovery Fund.
Help a man stay hydrated in the most inefficient, dramatic, Stone-Cold-approved way possible

How Funds Will Be Used:

.
One donation = one more shot at a clean pour (unlikely), one less puddle on the floor (also unlikely), and one more glorious moment of beer-drenched greatness.

Crack a can. Smash it loud.
And help Josh keep living the dream. üç∫üí•

campaigns.title: Support a SWCC
campaigns.story:
About Me:
Hello, my name is SB1, and I proudly served as a Special Warfare Combatant-craft Crewman (SWCC) in the U.S. Navy. During my service, I operated and maintained high-performance vessels, supporting Special Operations Forces in missions that included direct action, reconnaissance, and search and rescue. These operations often took place in challenging environments, such as coastal and riverine areas, where large ships couldn't operate. 

The nature of SWCC missions exposed me to significant physical demands and risks. Operating high-speed boats in rough waters subjected me to forces up to 64 times gravity and enduring constant, extreme blast pressures from heavy weapons caused hundreds of micro concussions. This has lead to musculoskeletal injuries and multiple traumatic brain injuries. These challenges have had lasting effects on my health and well-being.

As I transition to civilian life, I am seeking support to help cover medical expenses and assist with my ongoing recovery. Your generous contributions will make a meaningful difference in my journey toward healing and stability. Thank you for your support.

What I Need:
As a Special Warfare Combatant-craft Crewman (SWCC) in the U.S. Navy, I was entrusted with operating and maintaining high-speed vessels in perilous environments, supporting Special Operations Forces on missions that demanded precision and resilience. The relentless nature of these operations exposed me to extreme physical forces, including high-speed maneuvers in turbulent waters and the constant barrage of heavy weaponry, leading to numerous micro concussions. These experiences have resulted in significant musculoskeletal injuries and multiple traumatic brain injuries (TBIs), each carrying profound and lasting effects on my health and daily life.

The financial burden of these injuries is substantial. The average annual cost for TBI-specific care is approximately $11,700 in the first year, with subsequent years averaging around $4,600 to $11,100 per patient. Additionally, the lifetime cost of care for a severe TBI can range from $600,000 to $1,875,000.  These expenses encompass hospitalizations, outpatient therapies, assistive devices, and home modifications necessary for my recovery and daily living. Your generous support will help alleviate these financial burdens and assist me in achieving a stable and healthy civilian life.

How Funds Will Be Used:
**How Funds Will Be Used**

Your generous contributions will directly support my journey toward healing and stability. Here's a transparent breakdown of how the funds will be allocated:

1. **Medical Expenses**: Approximately $16,300 per year for the first year, covering hospitalizations, outpatient therapies, and assistive devices.

2. **Rehabilitation Services**: Costs for physical, occupational, and speech therapy, averaging $125 per hour.

3. **Home Modifications**: Expenses for necessary adjustments to my living space to accommodate mobility aids and ensure safety.

4. **Assistive Devices**: Purchasing equipment such as wheelchairs, braces, and other tools to aid in daily activities.

5. **Transportation**: Costs associated with accessible transportation for medical appointments and daily needs.

6. **Lost Income**: Compensating for time away from work due to medical treatments and recovery periods.

7. **Mental Health Support**: Accessing counseling and support groups to address the psychological impact of my injuries.

8. **Legal and Advocacy Services**: Seeking assistance to navigate veterans' benefits and ensure access to entitled resources.

While the total lifetime cost of care for a severe traumatic brain injury can reach up to $2,475,000, your support will significantly alleviate these financial burdens, enabling me to focus on recovery and rebuilding my life.

Thank you for your compassion and generosity.

campaigns.title: Project Harvest Guard- End Food Waste. Power a Farmer‚Äôs Future with a Solar-Cool Box.
campaigns.story:
About Me:
In America, we worry about rising grocery costs. In rural India, farmers worry about 30\% of their harvest rotting before it can be sold. That spoilage translates directly to poverty, debt, and hunger for farming families. Our team of social innovators is fighting this. We developed the 'Solar Cool-Box': a decentralized, zero-emission cold storage unit. It's an American-style innovation tackling a global crisis. By giving farmers a way to safely store their crops for three extra days, we empower them to negotiate better prices, stabilize their income, and break the cycle of poverty. Your support provides the technology that turns spoiled harvests into sustainable livelihoods

What I Need:
We are seeking to raise $18,000 USD to fund the first 10 Solar Cool-Box units in Beed District, India. This initial investment will stabilize the income of approximately 100 farming families in its first year. We are raising funds through Patriotpledgenfts under the umbrella of our 501(c)(3) US Fiscal Sponsor, making your donation tax-deductible. Your gift is not a charitable expense; it's an investment in sustainable development and economic stability.

How Funds Will Be Used:
We guarantee transparency with all funds raised toward our $18,000 USD goal. 80% is invested directly into manufacturing the 10 Solar Cool-Box units, funding the technology that stops food waste. 11% ensures local sustainability by training and supporting the Women's Self-Help Groups who will operate the boxes. The final 9% covers logistics, installation, and rigorous financial auditing to ensure full accountability to our US donors.

campaigns.title: Plight of Animal Lovers League
campaigns.story:
About Me:
Animal Lovers League (ALL) is a pioneering animal welfare organization in Singapore, founded in 2002 by Mohan Div Sreedharan and Catherine Lee Sai Lang Strong. As a registered charity, ALL has been a sanctuary for over 500 dogs and cats, many of whom are strays, abandoned, or in need of special care. Operating under a strict no-kill policy, ALL has become one of Singapore's largest and longest-serving rescue groups. ([animalloversleague.com](https://www.animalloversleague.com/about-us?utm_source=openai))

In 2018, ALL moved to The Animal Lodge (TAL), managed by the Animal and Veterinary Service (AVS), to accommodate its growing number of animals. However, the organization has faced significant challenges in recent years. The COVID-19 pandemic led to a sharp decline in donations, severely impacting ALL's financial stability. The shelter accumulated 53 months of unpaid rent, totaling approximately S$500,000, and substantial veterinary bills, estimated at around S$300,000. ([mothership.sg](https://mothership.sg/2025/12/animal-lovers-league-founders-age-financial-struggles/?utm_source=openai))

In August 2025, AVS decided not to renew ALL's tenancy at TAL due to concerns over animal welfare and the unpaid rent. This decision has forced ALL to plan for downsizing and rehoming its animals. Despite these setbacks, ALL remains committed to its mission of providing a safe haven for animals in need. ([straitstimes.com](https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/animal-lovers-league-loses-lease-at-the-animal-lodge-authorities-prioritising-animals-well-being//?utm_source=openai))

The founders acknowledge the difficulties faced and are actively working on plans to repay the outstanding rent and continue their operations. They express deep gratitude for the support received from the community and are hopeful for a positive resolution. ([straitstimes.com](https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/co-founders-of-all-working-out-plans-to-pay-back-rent-hoping-to-downsize-activities/?utm_source=openai))

What I Need:
Animal Lovers League (ALL) urgently requires financial assistance to overcome a severe crisis threatening its ability to continue operations. The shelter faces approximately S$500,000 in unpaid rent and around S$300,000 in veterinary bills, totaling an immediate need of S$800,000 to S$850,000. These debts have accumulated over the past four and a half years, during which ALL has struggled to secure sufficient public donations. The COVID-19 pandemic has intensified this challenge, leading to an increase in pet surrenders and a decline in support for animal welfare organizations. ([asiaone.com](https://www.asiaone.com/singapore/animal-lovers-league-mohan-cathy-downsize-operations-repay-rent?utm_source=openai))

To continue providing a safe haven for the animals in its care, ALL relies on public donations, including monetary contributions, food, and sponsorships. Additionally, foster support and volunteers are essential to manage the shelter's operations and care for the rescued pets. Your generous support can help ALL navigate this critical period and ensure the well-being of the animals that depend on them.

How Funds Will Be Used:
**Immediate Funding Breakdown**

- **Rental Arrears:** Approximately S$500,000, covering 53 months of unpaid rent to the Animal & Veterinary Service (AVS) for The Animal Lodge. ([straitstimes.com](https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/animal-lovers-league-loses-lease-at-the-animal-lodge-authorities-prioritising-animals-well-being//?utm_source=openai))

- **Outstanding Veterinary Bills:** Estimated between S$50,000 and S$150,000, reflecting the accumulated costs of medical care for the animals under our care. ([mothership.sg](https://mothership.sg/2025/12/animal-lovers-league-founders-age-financial-struggles/?utm_source=openai))

Your generous support is crucial in helping us address these financial challenges and continue providing a safe haven for the animals that depend on us.

campaigns.title: Gurhan Kiziloz is NOT Welcome at BlockDAG!!!!!
campaigns.story:
About Me:
Gurhan Kiziloz has been implicated in multiple fraudulent activities within the cryptocurrency sector, leaving a trail of financial devastation and broken trust. His ventures, including BlockDAG and MegaPosta, have been scrutinized for their lack of transparency and questionable practices. Investigations have revealed that Kiziloz, operating through offshore entities, has been diverting substantial funds from investors, raising serious concerns about the legitimacy of his projects. ([intelligenceline.com](https://www.intelligenceline.com/r/Reports/258662/gurhan-kiziloz-crypto-networks/?utm_source=openai))

The BlockDAG project, in particular, has been at the center of controversy. Despite advertising a massive $440 million raised in presales, independent checks have placed the actual funds at significantly lower figures, with large sums allegedly funneled through opaque channels to Middle Eastern over-the-counter (OTC) brokers. This pattern mirrors tactics used in previous ventures, where Kiziloz has been accused of inflating fundraising numbers and misappropriating investor funds. ([intelligenceline.com](https://www.intelligenceline.com/r/Reports/258674/gurhan-kiziloz-cryptos-hidden-rug-pull-mastermind/?utm_source=openai))

The community's response has been one of outrage and determination. Investors and supporters are uniting to reclaim control of the project, demanding that Kiziloz relinquish all social media accounts, domains, technology, and investor funds immediately. The collective effort aims to restore integrity to the project and hold Kiziloz accountable for his actions, ensuring that the consequences of his fraudulent activities follow him for the rest of his life.

What I Need:
The BlockDAG community urgently requires financial support to reclaim control of the project from Gurhan Kiziloz, whose alleged fraudulent activities have severely undermined its integrity. To restore transparency and trust, we need to secure the release of all social media accounts, domains, technology, and investor funds currently under his control. Your generous contribution will empower the community to take decisive action, ensuring that Kiziloz is held accountable and that the project can move forward with renewed integrity.

How Funds Will Be Used:
**How Funds Will Be Used**

Our goal is to raise $1,000 to empower the BlockDAG community in reclaiming control of the project from Gurhan Kiziloz and restoring its integrity. The funds will be allocated as follows:

1. **Legal Expenses: $500**

   Engaging legal professionals to initiate proceedings for the release of all social media accounts, domains, technology, and investor funds currently under Kiziloz's control. This includes drafting and filing necessary legal documents, court fees, and other associated costs.

2. **Technical Recovery: $300**

   Hiring blockchain and cybersecurity experts to secure and transfer control of the project's digital assets, ensuring the safety and integrity of the community's investments. This covers technical audits, system migrations, and implementation of security measures.

3. **Community Outreach: $100**

   Developing and distributing materials to inform and mobilize the community, including creating a website, producing informational content, and organizing virtual meetings to keep supporters updated and engaged.

4. **Administrative Costs: $100**

   Covering miscellaneous expenses such as communication tools, office supplies, and other operational costs necessary to coordinate and execute the recovery efforts effectively.

Your generous contribution will directly support these initiatives, enabling the community to take decisive action and ensure that Kiziloz is held accountable. Together, we can restore transparency and trust to the BlockDAG project.
